20110118021742.000|20110118021745.000|CC1|THE SAME CARB-RICH MEAL.

20110118021809.000|20110118021810.000|CC1|BANANA BEFORE WORKOUT.          
20110118021810.000|20110118021813.000|CC1|>> I'M NOT SAYING TO EAT A BIG  
20110118021813.000|20110118021813.000|CC1|BREAKFAST BEFOREHAND.           
20110118021813.000|20110118021815.000|CC1|I'M SAYING GET SOMETHING INTO   
20110118021815.000|20110118021816.000|CC1|YOUR STOMACH, GET SOME ENERGY,  
20110118021816.000|20110118021817.000|CC1|GET THROUGH THAT WORKOUT, WORK  
20110118021817.000|20110118021819.000|CC1|YOUR BUTT OFF, AFTERWARDS YOU   
20110118021819.000|20110118021820.000|CC1|KNOW EAT SOMETHING.             
20110118021820.000|20110118021822.000|CC1|GET THE PROTEIN THAT YOUR BODY  
20110118021822.000|20110118021823.000|CC1|REALLY CRAVES IN ORDER TO       
20110118021823.000|20110118021825.000|CC1|REBUILD YOUR MUSCLES AND LOSE   
20110118021825.000|20110118021826.000|CC1|THE FAT.                        
20110118021826.000|20110118021827.000|CC1|>> THE STUDY ALSO FOUND THAT    
20110118021827.000|20110118021829.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO WAITED TO EAT UNTIL  
20110118021829.000|20110118021831.000|CC1|AFTER A WORKOUT HAD LOWER BLOOD
